text.tspan: , this method executes the pipeline, by
running the previous methods. It takes a boolean in
input which specifies if the program
should search for extracts on Wikipedia; this is done
wikipediaTripleExtraction method can take a long time.
the database, starting from the rel attribute; it
takes in input a KnowledgeGraph database
instance. First, it adds the nodes (with a generic
“o” label which symbolizes an object), then
adds the edges; if a relation references a person
“org_”) the label of that node is updated from “o”
The graph is then created, but a final step is done
to update all nodes labels with the entity
generates an XML file from the
database contents, in order to export it. The structure
of the file is the following (it is based
on the files produced by ConneKtion in order to obtain
This is a static class which contains some utilities
for importing a graph from an XML file to the neo4J
used to load a XML formatted graph (the location of
the file is given in input with the String
source parameter) into the neo4J knowledge graph passed
in input. Once the file is loaded, if
found, it instantiates a DocumentBuilder that gives
access to methods for reading tags. It
then extracts all the “node” and the “edge” tags from
the file and loades them into the graph
with the addNode and addEdge methods respectively.
